title: Help missing flies
body: Hi so I need help I am running league on my mac and my system file under RADS went missing so I went and redowloaded lol to replace the file but when I downloaded the new one multiple files were missing from that one too I don't know what is going on plz help!

replies.body: Let's make sure you're able to get a clean working copy of the game by making sure all of the old files are first removed. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both options **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** checked. Make sure to run the tool as admin and let me know if that's able to help or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BYtiuizt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T04:00:18.962+0000)
>
> Let's make sure you're able to get a clean working copy of the game by making sure all of the old files are first removed. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both options **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** checked. Make sure to run the tool as admin and let me know if that's able to help or not.

Thanks for the help I was able to fix the problem last night by deleting everything lol related and trying another download
